'''StateProvider''' is a class that contains generic attack functions usable in [[Classes:Weapon|weapons]]. It also allows the use of [[Classes:PSprite|PSprites]] to draw animations on screen. The two classes based on it directly are [[Classes:Weapon|Weapon]] and [[Classes:CustomInventory|CustomInventory]]. == Methods == === Action === *[[A_JumpIfNoAmmo]] *[[A_CheckForReload]] *[[A_ResetReloadCounter]] *[[A_FireBullets]] *[[A_FireProjectile]] *[[A_CustomPunch]] *[[A_RailAttack]] *[[A_ReFire]] *[[A_ClearReFire]] [[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:StateProvider]]
